output.sentences: Giles wanted to hang out and smoke at the park and asked his friend to bring the beer.
His friend said nope to smoking with Giles, but sure he'd bring along some beer.
There guys sunning and hanging all over the park, one male had a tat above his pec.
Another dude showing off his naked chest looked male and virile with a tat on his back and a moustache and dark shades.
Some of the dudes came over to introdue themselves to Giles, hang and grab a beer, and that was cool too.
